title: Executive Order 8975-Authorizing the Attorney General To Make Appointments in the Alien Property Division Without Regard to the Requirements of the Civil Service Act and Rules
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 2 of the Civil Service Act (22 Stat. 404), the Attorney General of the United States is hereby authorized to make appointments to positions in the Alien Property Division, Department of Justice, including the position of head of the Division, without regard to the requirements of the Civil Service Act and Rules.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8975-Authorizing the Attorney General To Make Appointments in the Alien Property Division Without Regard to the Requirements of the Civil Service Act and Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368258
